songs.title: Fa La La (Acapella)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Justin Bieber]
This is the time of year we can give it, give it, give it, give it all
One through the note your list you can get it, get it, get it, get it all
Make your wish tonight when you open your eyes
When the lights go bright girl,I'll be right there

[Pre-Chorus: Justin Bieber & Boyz II Men]
Baby you deserve everything you want, it's your night, oh
Wanna put my ear to your chest girl

[Chorus: Justin Bieber & Boyz II Men]
Baby I hear melodies when your heart beats
Baby it sings to me like fa la la la la, fa la la la la
Baby I hear melodies when your heart beats
Baby it sings to me, now I know that it's Christmas time

[Verse 2: Boyz II Men]
You got on my favourite dress, you're looking, looking, looking good
Snow falling on your hair, and I don't, I don't want to get it off
Even the stars in the sky can't outshine your eyes
Want to be your biggest gift

[Pre-Chorus: Justin Bieber & Boyz II Men]
Baby you deserve everything you want, it's your night, oh
Wanna put my ear to your chest now

[Chorus: Justin Bieber & Boyz II Men]
Baby I hear melodies when your heart beats
Baby it sings to me like fa la la la la, fa la la la la
Baby I hear melodies when your heart beats
Baby it sings to me, now I know that it's Christmas time

[Bridge: Justin Bieber & Boyz II Men]
I'll deck your heart with boughs of holly, boughs of holly
Fa la la la la la la, fa la la la la la la
Baby cause you're the reason to be jolly
Fa la la la la la la, la la la la la la la

[Chorus: Justin Bieber & Boyz II Men]
Baby I hear melodies when your heart beats
Baby it sings to me like fa la la la la, fa la la la la
Baby I hear melodies when your heart beats
Baby it sings to me, now I know that it's Christmas time

[Outro: Justin Bieber & Boyz II Men]
Fa la la la la, fa la la la la, like Christmas
Know that it's Christmas time
Fa la la la la, fa la la la la
Know that it's Christmas time, yeah yeah
